selected_skills.name: interpret_diagram_for_geometry
selected_skills.purpose: To identify the geometric shapes of the windows from the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash to extract and identify the geometric shapes depicted in the diagram.

new_skill_specs.name: determine_common_shapes_in_houses
new_skill_specs.purpose: To determine if the given geometric shapes are common in most houses.
inputs: A list of geometric shapes identified from the diagram.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A boolean indicating if the shapes are common in most houses.
edge_cases: Some shapes are common, others are not.
